attributes.action: Please Support Guyanas Deal To Become An Untouched Reserve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am not sure how many people are aware of this, however Guyana is the last untouched pristine tropical rain forest in the world and is both an eco system we should preserve and it also holds many of the trees which could halt our descent into global warming.

Guyana's president has contacted the British government requested aid so that he can stop any potential logging etc that would devastate a country which is mainly pristine untouched ecosystem. As yet the British government has not replied.

Id like to apply pressure at the very least to the British government and the EU and possibly the world to stop wasting money on junkets and other wasteful things and divert funding to Guyana. Please help to save both a wonderful ecosystem and a part of this planets lungs for us and future generations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
